div.div: I liked this app...until it started to pester me about notifications. All I want is a badge icon, and no banners, or pop ups, because when people are messaging me in bursts, my phone cannot be used except to close the excerpts from said messages. SO, now that I've changed that personal PREFERENCE, every time I open messenger, it asks me to turn on my notifications because that's the way "the app works best." I decide, you slag, you so-and-so! I decide. This app will soon be deleted if it doesn't check itself.
I absolutely hate this app and switching back and forth! I am deleting and refuse to use it.
I have 2 accounts on my tablet, and I have to uninstall and install if my husband and I switch profiles! It's bad. Make it like Facebook to have 2 accounts with a passcodex then 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è. üò°üò°
Constantly shutting down and freezing

Receiving and sending messages are difficult. I got an important message 3 years late because I was not notified. I only saw the message about a month ago because I went to message the person. Also deleting multiple messages at once would be very useful in addition to being able to access spam and other folder via app

Can you fix the sending part of the app for some people it goes straight to delivered and other people it says sent and won't go to delivered on it would sit like that all day SO CAN YOU PLEASE FIX THAT üíØ

div.span: by Wow, fun and adicting game:)

div.div: This app keeps crashing when I try to load older conversations or the photos within the app conversation in "shared photos".
It needs log out log in feature and then the app will be perfect.
I enjoy this app and everything it offers. Easy to use and sufficient.
When I open a conversation and I scroll up the text box disappears and won't scroll down

I loved it; enjoyed the notifications, swift conversations. I was fine with the invasion into my private life but then, w/o warning, each time I tried to open or retrieve a message I was sent back to my home screen. Therefore, currently I have msgs but there is no way I can read them because now the app refuses to download on my phone. Facebook, what more do you want??? :-)!!! Please fix the app. Thank you.

This messenger never works, you need perfect wifi to connect. Snap chat and vine which takes up more space through messaging doesn't have to be connected through wifi to send messages. Ever since this app became mandatory I haven't been able to communicate through Facebook over the phone efficiently. The messenger is always trying to connect and never actually connects. Make a new messenger before everyone quits! Thanks!!

The app works great, however when a notification appears and it gives you the option to either reply or mute there should be a place to actually type a reply as opposed to switching applications. I think it would be so much easier and faster to be able to reply as you can on texts.

div.strong: Stupid idea to separate app for one site

div.div: Facebook doesn't understand users have limited space in their phone.

Seeing all the reviews and what's been going on kind of weirds me out. It's really not cool that FB is doing this. Honestly I barely use FB anymore. I only use it for the messenger app in which I can keep in touch with distant friends who can't text. My complaint though, I don't like completely opening the messenger. It would be so much nicer if it just had a little screen pop up to reply reply quick then continue with whatever you're doing instead of completely opening the app, respond, then close it again. It's such a bother especially since Apple allows you to quick respond but FB doesn't. I'm debating if I should just switch to a different messenger app. Kind of lame.

I installed it now just so I can write this here review, which isn't much of a review at all. So why does this have to be separate from the actual Facebook App. So more notifications etc. And more space taken. It's just annoying yes I know you can turn off notifications but it still manages to somehow notify/annoy the user. Listen it's just plain silly that it's 2 apps instead of 1, why?? FB already has a messenger!

I've tried to video call more than two people and the sound wont work (I can hear them but they cant hear me), and no, its not my phone. I can call people using my phone (not messenger) and it works perfectly. Also, I can voice call on messenger and it works, just not video call. Please fix.
I love the app it just needs a sigh out way so we can switch between facebook a if we have too.

div.strong: Don't always know I got a message

div.div: Sound notifications not consistent since recent update.

I have been using this app for several years. The biggest issue if you have lots of friends is the overwhelming number of messages you receive in any given time. The app crashes all the time and on several occasions the app logs me out.
Normally I would give the app a 3 star, but these idiots at Facebook do not believe I am who I am without Govt ID. Fat chance that will happen after someone sent me an email saying, "Your account is about to be suspended if you do not respond", the email looked like an official FB email, so I started filling out information. Username and password, name, date of birth, but when they asked for my social security # I knew it was a hacker trying to steal my account.
Do not waste your time with the app, they need to let you be able to turn it off when you want and turn it back on in a simpler manner. Personally Facebook can keep my account, save me time and money.

div.strong: Crashes, recurrent can't-open episodes reappear every 2-3 mos

div.div: Used for about a year net. Crash spasms reappear about every 3 mos where it just won't open. Reinstalled twice in 6 months. Too frustrating.
Doesn't help at all

I'm able to talk to friends, family, loved ones across the globe for FREE. Great connection. Sometimes it cuts in and out. But I'm still able to connect with minimal disturbance and don't pay a dime. Love this so much.
Great app
I hate this App! It's a waste of time, space, and money. Having to go through two apps just to have a conversation on Facebook is ridiculous.
Cannot stand this new messenger crap
I usually don't have any complaints about the app- but the past two days, when I try to send a message, it doesn't deliver till way later! Please fix this issue! It's minor, but majorly irritating!!
They need to fix the video chat and the phone call it always freezes
Please stop nagging to turn on notifications. Maybe I don't want them on.

Truth be told, it's not a bad app. Compared to having to switch over to the messages tab every time in the old FB app, I much prefer this clean approach. So accept the reality and move on instead of bombarding a perfectly functional app with 1-star grudgy reviews.
Update: latest version seems to have a problem with the font color of message in the bottommost blue chat bubble being black for a split second after send button is pressed. Happened after I updated to iOS 9.
Cepat penghantaran & Mudah di gunakan. Kbye
I seriously hate how every time i need to text someone on facebook i have to switch to messenger and takes EVEN MORE DATAAA!!! DAMMIT
Why do we need a whole other app when there's already a messages tab in the Facebook app that takes up WAY too much space in the first place...?
A lot of people seem to think that this app is horrible. I really don't use Facebook itself, but messenger is another story. It does everything it's supposed to, and does it well.

I don't spend a lot of time writing reviews, but I've just sent a message to a friend well over an hour ago that has still not been delivered. And this is not an exception. It's much more efficient to text then to use this app.

Messenger within the facebook app was so much better. Why don't it let us check it thru facebook app?
Hate adding another stupid app on my device

I know you have the option of sending a location to someone with a big arse map, but I miss the days you could simply press on a message to see where a person sent it from and then close the map by pressing on the message again. It would be awesome if that feature were brought back.
Also, this app is the most inconsistent and buggy app I use. I miss notifications on a daily basis. The notifications are turned on, the volume is on, and I power cycle my phone a few times a week to try to eliminate weird app problems. Messenger is consistently inconsistent.
Real talk: I like the Pusheen cats. It's honestly the only reason I use the app. If it weren't for the cats, I wouldn't use the app.
This app is a huge piece of s**t
The app itself is great and all but everything I send a video to my friends it comes out blurry on there screen. Please fix this problem.

div.strong: Why two apps for one program?

div.div: Being forced to use a second app for the full Facebook service deserves one star. Please let us use this in addition if we want, but allow messaging in the facebook app.

This app has been just fine forever, not sure why it's a separate app from Facebook, but that a different conversation. I updated to iOS 9 and suddenly it's a ghost app ... Gone! The App Store thinks I already have it downloaded, which I did, but now it's nowhere to be found in my phone. Facebook thinks it's there, try and open it through the Facebook app and nothing happens. :/ No way to uninstall, reinstall. Something broke after the update.
Will not let me view whole messages, reply section is missing.

div.strong: The video call quality was great

div.div: This app is great. I wish they would add the quick reply feature since it's accessible to 3rd party apps in iOS 9.
Awful, intrusive. I'd rather delete FB from my phone
This app is terrible. Why can't they include messages in the Facebook app. Do not download this app. Get your act together Facebook. Avoid this app!!!

Needs to update profile pictures when they change on Facebook so your not stuck with the old profile circle icons anymore. Also having problems with it saying I'm not on messenger when I am, (no blue icon). Also make it so you don't have to go to the different app just to see a message when your on the Facebook app, it's annoying and a waste of time. With every update I haven't seen any change, maybe the complaints should actually be fixed

Being reminded of notification settings every time I switch from FB to Messenger is very annoying. I know how to switch the notifications on. If I wanted them on I would turn them on. I prefer seeing them at the bottom when I open FB, and I don't need more alerts clogging up my phone for every message. Hesitated for months to cave in to the separate Messenger app. Now thinking I should have kept it off the phone!
Im so tired of this app- just let me message people on the main app and stop recording our shared Data Facebook you scoundrel
Since the latest iOS update, I now have to sign in each time I go in to Messenger. Really?!!?
So I've been sending files through messenger for a while now , but now that I've updated to IOS9, files such as WAV and MP3 don't open.
when I scroll up to see the messages, I couldn't use keyboard. I meant I can type, but i couldn't see what I typed n I couldn't send the message
Takes up to much memory just to message people when you can just use your browser. Which is what I have to do since my messenger won't even open!!!!!

Come on, Facebook. What are you guys even doing? Facebook used to be so simple and honest. Now you spy on us from every angle. I don't get it. I feel invaded, but I have to use the messenger to talk to someone. I don't appreciate this at all. I think it's really disrespectful to make us agree to some of the stuff that you are. Please stop all of this and make Facebook simple and normal, again.

Forces you to enable notifications, banners, badges, and whatever else. If you don't there will be a pop up that you can't dismiss permanently. This is super ridiculous. Users should be able to enable notifications as they see fit.

This app anytime you open it will constantly ask if you want to turn on notifications. NO!!! HOW MANY MORE TIMES DO YOU WANT TO KNOW THAT? I don't want Facebook in every part of my life!!! I DONT want notifications!! Stop harassing your users.

div.strong: Forces you to turn on notifications

div.div: will imrove my rating if you can stop "reminding" me to turn on notifications. i dont want my notifications turned on üòí
Glitchy, can't reinstall now.
Wowzie where is egg
I hate to have another app for this. It takes up space.

Okay, nay-sayers... Here's your answer to a couple of complaints: 1. You indeed CAN turn off all the chirping alerts (at least in iOS) - change the Messenger notification settings in your Settings menu, the same way you would to adjust the notification sounds and settings for your other app alerts, including facebook. 2. You indeed CAN view your facebook messages outside of fMessenger. You do it by logging into facebook through your smart devices' browser, rather than an app.
Those being said, I like Messenger alright because I happened to have enough room on my iPhone and iPad. It's irritating that I have to jump back and forth - IF I CHOOSE TO - but it doesn't ruin my day. I see a badge if someone has added a comment to a thread, and the number of threads that were added to. The stickers are pretty cute, but way too large - they take up too much screen room, imo.
Please give us a passcode!!!!

Every time I write a message longer than two sentences it freezes. No matter if I exit out, throw the app out of my tray it still stays frozen. I'm sick of having to uninstall and reinstall all the time!
Why can't you access your "other messages" option in the app?!?!
The update made my messenger crash everytime i open it
Having two apps for this is ridiculous. Also add a way to show that your away or offline.
Very Awesome App

Every since the last update my messages don't deliver for hours. I don't understand why, but it is so annoying. If I send someone a message I want them to get it then, not hours later. Please, please fix this.
great application
this app keeps freezing on me and i dont like it. please fix it

Honestly have no clue as to why people are having problems and disliking the app. I find it great to use but ITS A LITTLE BUGGY FOR IOS9 PLEASE FIX. Love the app but upgraded to 9 today n it's a little buggy

If you want to be constantly be bugged by this additional app from Facebook, do download this app. The most ridiculous app I've ever had the misfortune to download. I do not want notifications an if the app asks me to turn them on every time I open it, I will delete it instead.

I think this app is fast, simple, and efficient. It fits my needs and works great. Especially like how it's so easy to go back to the other Facebook app. Although, it's too bad they can't just combine both apps, but it's understandable why the don't because then it would be super slow and every time it had to update it would take forever. Also, the Messenger app's voice and video chat feature is probably one of the best ideas Facebook has had because sometimes I prefer to use it instead of calling with my phone. The quality is way better and you can do it with any smart device, tablets, phones, iPod Touch, etc... It's so convenient and I hope they NEVER take that away.

My notifications keep ringing non-stop due to the fact all my read messages keeps coming on the lock screen over and over again even though they are read. Fix this please because I'm tired of new updates every two weeks and problems are not being fixed.

div.strong: I can use it when it works

div.div: I liked it better when I could chat with my friends in the Facebook app. It's irritating having to switch apps just to send a message. It's like going through a loading screen just to talk to a character for a few seconds in a video game. Irritating at unnecessary at best. Also, it doesn't work right half the time. Overall, Facebook messenger has been a bad experience for me.

It doesn't even work on my iPhone4!! To check my messages I constantly am having to either update the app, which takes like a full day to upload, or I have to go to my internet and log into Facebook that way. As it is Messenger is no longer something I use. FB is next down the delete drain, I think.

Dear Facebook: I know what you‚Äôre doing. you‚Äôre trying to dominate every aspect of our lives‚Ä¶ and you‚Äôre succeeding for the most part. So why must you now resort to pestering us until we fold and use your apps? We all know that the Facebook app doesn‚Äôt allow messages any longer. Instead we have to use messenger. Fine. So I grudgingly downloaded it. Then I found it to be too distracting throughout the day‚Ä¶ so I removed notifications. Now I constantly get reminders that messenger ‚Äúwould work better‚Äù if I allowed notifications‚Ä¶ the kicker is, there is no way to shut off the ‚Äúreminder‚Äù to turn on notifications. So no matter what I do, not have messenger, or not allow notifications, you still force me to get distractions. This is a horrible tactic that you are using Facebook, you should be ashamed.
Since i update this and ios 9, the app crash every time i try to use it, this is so annoying and for now this app is just taking up space in my phone.
Haters gonna hate

This app has gotten worse ever since it updated. It's annoying when I'm tryouts my to send a message and automatically crashes and then I have to start all over. It was better before it was updated because now it even worse I'm disappointed this needs to be fixed immediately!!
Good and nice

It's incredibly stupid to have 2 separate apps on my phone for Facebook. Why can't it just be one app? As far as the app itself, it works fine other than the fact that it asked you to turn on notifications every time you open it.

...or else we're going to pop up and bug you about it almost every time you open our app. Because we want to make sure you don't forget that we really, really, REALLY want you to enable notifications.
What's that? You think you can get by with enabling notifications, but only the badge icon so it's as unobtrusive as possible? NOT SO FAST! We're not going to stop pestering you until you enable notifications, AND enable at least banner notifications, AND let them show up on your lock screen.

Is a great app and easy to use

div.strong: I hated it from day 1 and I was right to do so.

div.div:
Basically, I don't see why the messenger and the main app even have to be separate. I hate switching apps all the time, I hate taking up extra space on my phone, and I just plain hate the entire concept. But that aside, about the app itself: it's okay. The messages come quickly and it loads well, I've never had any problems and the stickers are cute as hell. What's my issue?
I can't tell it to shut up. Either I can't find the setting (which means the app needs work on user interface) or the setting doesn't exist (which is just bad form). It DINGS super loudly when you get a message, that's bad enough. But then it makes all these SOUNDS while you're actually IN the app. Popping sounds, chirping, ticking, it's like a noisy bird you didn't ask for but you HAD to get if you wanted to talk to anybody. I'd actually LIKE this app if I could just tell it "only make noise when I get a message. Otherwise, shut up". But the closest thing I can see to that is "mute" and that's at timed intervals.
Give me a Shush button and I'll be happy.
After I tried to update messenger, I can no longer access it... Apparently it's still installing since yesterday. Please fix this.
FB is ever great application to social communication each and other. Also it is easy to use for everybody ..,,
Very comfortable interface, nice to chat;)
Go back go back Log out log in Difficulty Hate u
It works well except how you HAVE to have the app to go on your messages. Also, the app crashes whenever I try to go to my shared photos. It also crashes randomly

Please add the log out button. I know we arent supposed to have multiple accounts but sometimes friends direly need to use my phone to log into their messenger and tell someone important things, and sometimes people HAVE to have multiple accounts for various reasons. Or even log out to save battery! Please add the feature back in. It should not have to be begged for it to come back :(

I hate this app. Why can't they incorporate it inside Facebook like it used to be? I hate having another app on my screen, I hate using they extra data, hate, hate, hate it. I wouldn't use it but people insist on sending me texts via it. Bad!
Can't log out from messenger. It's kinda personal to see messenger . It's weird without logout
Easy using, easy call and video call, cute stickers, cute tunes, awesome! I love it!

Happy to say that fb messenger brings my world near to me. This is my daily dose of medicine communicating with my kids. Five star üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª
